rules_text:
Strain [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell you may have all lands that produced mana to cast it not untap during your next untap step.)[/i]
Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them. Put that card onto the battlefield if its mana value is 3 or less and Mystic Communion was strained. Otherwise, put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
